name: Conigent
overview: Conigent is an organization dedicated to providing successful business and IT solutions that distinctly fit their clientsâ€™ needs, in the areas of software justification and selection, implementations and customizations, interfaces and integrations, and project management. The firm specializes in improving manufacturing and distribution company operations by studying existing business processes, and then offering redesigned processes combined with supporting software tools specifically aimed at improving cash flow, inventory control, product turn, staffing efficiency, return on investment, and a myriad of other client specific enhancements. Conigent’s staff has many years of experience in helping businesses achieve best practices and includes project managers, business and finance consultants, software architects and engineers, and specialists in fields such as ERP, TMS, and CRM.
